column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As for me and my other friend
column2: we both got one of different chicken ramen bowls. We all also ordered fried brussel sprouts. I actually do not eat brussel sprouts but these were good! For my chicken ramen
column3: I did add fried onions and would later get extra noodles for $2.50. We were all stuffed by end.
